meanings.definition: To broadcast (a program or event) on television.
meanings.sent1: The station will be televising the live concert tonight.
meanings.sent2: They are televising the football game on all the channels.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd be televising my own cooking show!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like televising sunshine to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick was as mesmerizing as televising a fireworks display.

meanings.definition: The act of transmitting a television program.
meanings.sent1: The televising of the news was interrupted by a technical glitch.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the televising of nature documentaries on this channel.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be fascinated by the televising of a bird documentary.
meanings.sent4: The televising of emotions through the actors' expressions was captivating.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors in the televising of the sunset made it look like a painting.
